description: ONZACK Grafana Dashboard for Kubernetes, OpenShift and other Kubernetes distribution.

targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!="Running", phase!="Succeeded", namespace=~"$namespace"})
+
sum(changes(kube_pod_status_ready{namespace=~"$namespace", condition="true"}[5m]))
+
(sum(kube_job_status_failed{namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_misscheduled{namespace=~"$namespace"})OR on() vector(0))

panels.description:
Deployments = Replica missmatch  
Statefulsets = Replica missmatch  
Daemonsets = Replica missmatch
panels.title: Failures

panels.description: No data means there are no Jobs/CronJobs in this namespace
panels.title: Failed Jobs

panels.description: No data means there are no Deployments in this namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0

panels.title: Deployments/Replicasets with Replica missmatch

panels.description: No data means there are no Statefulsets in this namespace
panels.title: Statefulsets with Replica missmatch

panels.description: No data means there are no Daemonsets in this namespace
panels.title: Daemonsets misscheduled

targets.expr:
100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.memory"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.memory"})

sum by (container, pod) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 0.75 > sum by (container, pod) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1

sum by (container, pod) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 1.75 < sum by (container, pod) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:cpu:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
/
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace"})

sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 0.75 > sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1

sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) * 1.75 < sum by (container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes:sum{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests:memory:running{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0.1

title: Kubernetes Standard Namespace Monitoring
